intro: Sphaeradenia pallida, commonly known as the pale sphaeradenia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Aristolochiaceae. It is characterized by its unique, hooded flowers that are often white or pale in color. The plant typically grows in tropical and subtropical regions, often in shaded, moist environments. Its leaves are usually heart-shaped and have a smooth texture. Sphaeradenia pallida is notable for its medicinal properties, with various parts of the plant used in traditional herbal remedies.
